cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Oh, shoot! For once I'm too late.
cbml:panel.note: Sonic witnesses a Death Egg Robot fall in front of a fortress.

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: "Looks like Knuckles hogged all the fun!"
cbml:panel.note: Knuckles rips the wires off of the fallen Death Egg Robot as Sonic runs down a hill, approaching them.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Yo Knux! Save any for me?
Sonic! Long time no see!
cbml:panel.note: Sonic asks Knuckles if he has saved any parts of the Death Egg Robot for Sonic, and Knuckles greets him.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: What brings you out here?
I ran into Amy in the next town over. She said you were looking into trouble here. I thought I'd lend a hand.
cbml:panel.note: Knuckles chats with Sonic about why Sonic came to see Knuckles. Sonic explains that he met Amy Rose, claiming that she told Sonic that Knuckles was looking for trouble, and that Sonic would like to help Knuckles.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Y'know, you're awfully far away from the HQ, Commander Knuckles.
Ugh... don't remind me.
cbml:panel.note: Sonic teases Knuckles as he tells him that Knuckles is far away from the headquarters. Knuckles refuses to have Sonic remind him.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: It was more interesting when we were fighting to save the world. Now that we're focusing on rebuilding, it's all scheduling and inventory and... peh! I've got no patience for it. I'm ready to get back to Angel Island and go on a good old-fashioned treasure hunt.
I hear ya. Amy tried to get me to enlist full time.
Ha! You? She should've known better.
cbml:panel.note: Knuckles chats with Sonic about how Knuckles would rather head to Angel Island to look for treasure. Sonic says to Knuckles that Amy tried to enlist Sonic into that adventure too.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: So, what's going on here?
This town is a hub for Wispon distribution. The shipments suddenly dried up, so I came to see why.
cbml:panel.note: Knuckles tells Sonic that the village is distributing Wispons when their shipments are suddenly facing issues.

cbml:balloon.emph: Hey! I'm the commander of the resistance! I took out all of Eggman's robots! Let me in!

cbml:panel.note: Knuckles yells that he is the commander and that he wants to enter the fort.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: S-sorry, sir, but I'm under orders not to open the gates to anyone!
cbml:panel.note: A dog-like character denies Knuckles' entry to the fort.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: I-I-I can't say!
cbml:panel.note: Knuckles is surprised that the dog-like character would not let Knuckles into the fort.
Knuckles and Sonic look at each other with determined looks on their faces.
Sonic and Knuckles climb the walls of the fort as the dog-like character is shocked to see them enter that way.
Sonic and Knuckles land into the fort grounds, and two animals are shocked about their entry.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: The Badnik attacks have been getting more aggressive lately. Maybe that's what's got them spooked?
I don't think so. Something else is going on...
cbml:panel.note: As many animals panic, run away, and hide in their homes, Sonic and Knuckles wonder why the animals are so scared.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: You shouldn't have done that! You shouldn't be here!
Why? Whatever's wrong, we can fix it.
cbml:panel.note: A dog-like character tells Sonic and Knuckles that they should not be in the fort, but Sonic tells them that he and Knuckles will be fine with any problem they would face.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: No-- you can't! They took all the Wisps and Wispons! Without those Wispons, or a way to power them, we don't stand a chance! They're unstoppable now!
"They" who?
Listen, buddy-- you just watched my friend here solo a Super Badnik. We can handle ourselves. Start from the beginning-- what's up?
cbml:panel.note: The dog-like character tells Sonic and Knuckles that all the Wisps and Wispons have been stolen. Knuckles is confused about who stole them, and Sonic consoles the dog-like character, telling him that Knuckles defeated a Death Egg Robot.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: True enough... okay...
...Just before the war ended, a couple of mercenaries showed up and they were ferocious. They drove back Eggman's forces and saved the town. They said they were going to improve our defenses...
cbml:panel.note: The dog-like character tells a story that Rough and Tumble entered the village before the war ended, and it is claimed that Rough and Tumble will increase their defense.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: ...But what they really did ws take our arsenal and took us prisoner within our own town! Now we have to do everything they say. We have no way to fight back. And we can't escape with all the robots stalking outside the wall!
cbml:panel.note: The dog-like character says that Rough and Tumble used their arsenal of robots to hold every villager hostage, and that there is nothing the villagers can do.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Well then. I think we need to take our complaints straight to the management, eh, Knux?
cbml:panel.note: Sonic and Knuckles agree that they will take their complaints to the manager of the village.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Where can we find these clowns?
Th-they turned the supply depot into a fortress. Just down this road on the right-- you can't miss it.
Cool. Sit tight. We've got this.
cbml:panel.note: Sonic asks the dog-like character where Rough and Tumble are, and the dog-like character tells Sonic and Knuckles where they are located.
Knuckles glides into a room where there are crates and Wisp containers everywhere. Sonic watches Knuckles investigate the room.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Yo! I found the Wisps!
cbml:panel.note: Sonic whispers to Knuckles that Sonic found some Wisps.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Just before he... went solo... Tails gave us the cipher for the Wisps' language. We asked for their help in fighting Eggman. They volunteered happily, even choosing to wait in deployment pods like these for when our troops could enter an area. But these guys are being horded. This is inexcusable.
cbml:panel.note: Knuckles pets one of the Wisp containers as he tells a story about Tails and his cipher to translate the Wisps' language, as well as the Wisps' fight against Eggman.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Hang tight just a little longer. We'll free all of you!
cbml:panel.note: Knuckles hears a laughing sound in the background as Sonic tells a Blue Cube that all the wisps will be set free shortly.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Nice one, idiot!
Yeah! Now get us another round before we beat some sense into ya!
cbml:panel.note: Rough and Tumble force some animals to give Rough and Tumble more food.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Wow. They make the hooligans look like class acts.
I'm gonna break them in half!
cbml:panel.note: Sonic and Knuckles witnesses Rough and Tumble humiliate the animals. Knuckles is enraged about that.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Steady. Let's take this one slow. Give the villagers a chance to get out of the line of fire.
Right. Then I'll break 'em!
cbml:panel.note: Sonic and Knuckles plan their attack on Rough and Tumble.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Hey! Tweedle-dumb and tweedle-dumber!
cbml:panel.note: Sonic grabs Rough and Tumble's attention, as well as the other animals'.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: I'm Sonic the Hedgehog. Maybe you've heard of me?
This is Knuckles the Echidna, commander of the resistance. You guys are guilty of theft, extortion, kidnapping, and being grade-A jerks. So you can either come along quietly, or we're gonna get loud.
cbml:panel.note: Sonic introduces himself and Knuckles to Rough and Tumble, and he also tells the perpetrators what they did wrong and how Sonic and Knuckles would punish them.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Who said you could come into our town, huh?! Who said you could ruin our fun?!
Yeah, we've heard of you, hero! But you clearly ain't heard of us!
cbml:panel.note: Rough and Tumble are not happy about Sonic and Knuckles disrupting their "fun". Tumble breaks a glass in his anger.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: You lookin' to scrap?
Then get ready to crumble!
Brace yourselves for--
cbml:panel.note: Rough and Tumble proceed to introduce themselves.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: --Rough & Tumble!
cbml:panel.note: Rough and Tumble say their names as they strike epic poses.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: ...Oh no. I was not prepared for this.
Careful, Sonic. They're highly coordinated.
cbml:panel.note: Sonic holds back his laughter as Knuckles warns Sonic to be careful.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Knuckles... you're the salt of the Earth.
cbml:panel.note: Sonic laughs as he calls Knuckles the salt of the Earth.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Whatever-- let's get 'em!
cbml:panel.note: Sonic and Knuckles charge toward Rough and Tumble.
Knuckles dodges Rough's kick.
Sonic spin-dashes into Tumble.
Knuckles swings a punch at Rough across his face.
Tumble catches Sonic as Sonic tries to spin-dash into Tumble again.
Tumble bounces Sonic like a ball.
Tumble throws Sonic like a ball.
Sonic hits a wooden pillar feetfirst.
Tumble has a surprised look on his face.
Sonic spin-dashes into Tumble again, this time hitting his face
Rough does a wall-jump above Knuckles.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Stink bomber!
cbml:panel.note: Rough launches a stink bomber attack as he looks at Knuckles.
Rough unleashes a big, green cloud of stinky gas on Knuckles.
Knuckles, with tears in his eyes, attempts to punch Rough.
Knuckles punches Rough so hard that Rough got sent through the wooden floor.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: C'mon bro, we ain't done yet...
cbml:panel.note: Tumble picks up Rough from the ground.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Whugh... you okay, dude?
I'mb fuhne.
cbml:panel.note: Sonic and Knuckles try to resist Rough's stench as Sonic asks Knuckles if he is okay.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: No more messin' around!
Say your prayers, chumps!
cbml:panel.note: Rough and Tumble take out their Wispons.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Okay, that might be a problem.
I'll distract them. You grab a Wispon of your own and--
cbml:panel.note: Sonic and Knuckles form another strategy for attacking Rough and Tumble.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: No... I can do one better...
cbml:panel.note: Sonic tells Knuckles that he can do one better, and then Sonic high-fives Yacker.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Wisps! It's me-- your old buddy Sonic! I saved your planet from Dr. Eggman, remember?
cbml:panel.note: Sonic calls out to the Wisps.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: A bunch of you chose to stick around on this world! You helped me on Lost Hex! You helped the resistance fight the Eggman Empire!
cbml:panel.note: Rough and Tumble look confused as Sonic continues to summon the Wisps.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: I know fighting isn't your thing, but you've proven you're all powerful and brave! Don't let these jerks boss you around! They need you to bully everyone, but you don't need them!
cbml:panel.note: Sonic ensures that the Wisps are strong, courageous creatures, and he talks to the Wisps about Rough and Tumble.
Ivory Lightning is loaded inside a yellow Wispon.
Red Burst is loaded inside a red Wispon.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Gyeh!
cbml:panel.note: As Ivory Lightning and Red Burst escape from Rough and Tumble's Wispons, Rough and Tumble are shocked about that.
Many Wisps surround Rough and Tumble.
Sonic and Knuckles fist-bump each other.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: C'mon c'mon c'mon!
One of you get in this thing right now!
cbml:panel.note: Rough and Tumble force some Red Burst Wisps back into their Wispons.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: They've certainly bumbled.
The tables have turned.
It's butt-kick time for Rough and Tumble!

cbml:balloon.emph: That's our thing! You can't do our thing!

cbml:panel.note: As Tumble opens a crate, Rough gets angry at Sonic and Knuckles for stealing his and Tumble's catchphrase.
Sonic and Knuckles knock Rough and Tumble out.
As Sonic and Knuckles take Rough and Tumble out of the fort, many animals and Wisps cheer for Sonic and Knuckles.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: You did it! How can we ever repay you?
Serve up some chilidogs and we'll call it even.
cbml:panel.note: The dog-like character from earlier approaches Sonic. This time, the dog-like character has a Wispon.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Er... what's it saying?
No idea. I don't have Tails' translator handy.
cbml:panel.note: Yellow Drill happily speaks in its native language. Sonic and the dog-like character don't know what Yellow Drill is saying.
Yellow Drill enters the dog-like character's Wispon.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Thank you! Thank you so much!
I get it now. It's saying the Wisps plan to stick around and help you guys defend the town.
cbml:panel.note: The dog-like character thanks Yellow Drill, and Sonic now understands what Yellow Drill is saying.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Hope you enjoyed it while it lasted.
You two are going to be locked up for a long time.
Peh!
cbml:panel.note: Two animals tease Rough and Tumble, telling them that they will be arrested.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Their little cells won't hold us for long! We'll be out-- and then we're coming for you!
You've made lifelong enemies of--
--Rough & Tumble!
cbml:panel.note: Rough and Tumble claim that they will return sometime soon.
Sonic and Knuckles laugh at Rough and Tumble.
Everyone else laughs at Rough and Tumble as the two perpetrators get taken out of the fort.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Thanks for the help. Not that I needed it...
Nah, but you didn't share the Badniks outside. You owed me this.
cbml:panel.note: Knuckles thanks Sonic for helping him in this adventure to stop Rough and Tumble.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Hopefully this is the start of things settling down. I really do miss home.
I wouldn't mind a vacation myself. First we've got to figure out who's controlling Eggman's leftover Badniks.
cbml:panel.note: Sonic and Knuckles pet some Wisps as they plan what to do in their next adventure.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: But before that-- we party!
cbml:panel.note: Sonic and Knuckles throw a party for accomplishing yet another mission.
As Sonic and Knuckles celebrate with the animals and Wisps, a Flapper watches them from above.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: So... Knuckles is still playing hero on the surface.
cbml:panel.note: Dr. Eggman watches Sonic and Knuckles through a large screen.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: That means Angel Island is unguarded. The Master Emerald is prone. That will accelerate my plans considerably...
cbml:panel.cbml:caption: Next time: Sonic tangles with a new hero & another returns in a blaze of glory!
cbml:panel.note: Details about Angel Island are shown on Dr. Eggman's screen. A teaser about the next issue of this comic book series is shown on the bottom-right corner of this panel.

div.p: Hello Sonic fans! Hope you enjoyed Sonic the Hedgehog #3 & Knuckles! Some very exciting action with the debut of those bad boys Rough and Tumble, but they sure crumbled before Sonic and Knux in this fantastic story by Ian Flynn, Jennifer Hernandez, Heather Breckel, and Corey Breen! Nice work, team!
Now, as usual (oh man, we can already say "as usual"? Wow!) here's your art, cosplay, and letters!
So I've been a Sonic fan for as long as I can remember.

figure.figDesc: Fanart of Super Sonic and two Chaos Emeralds

div.p: Art by Mecha the Techa

One of my earliest and clearest memories is when my big sis got my big bro a Sega for Xmas. The one that came with Sonic 2 and had him and Tails on the box. I remember doing my best to play Tails and help my bro get through levels as fast as we could. The cartoon was why I woke up on Saturday mornings. I remember I'd be up before anyone even without an alarm clock cuz I knew Sonic was gonna be on.

I grew up with the blue blur. I've caught up to the comics til just before the end of the long run. Sonic has been my inspiration, motivation, and role model for decades. I always wanted to be like him. I'm nearing 30 years old now and still love everything Sonic. It's a kind of love and loyalty you cant lose. No matter how fast you run. Love you Sonic, hope this comic run lasts even longer than the last.
Sadko Von Margolin

That's really wonderful, Sadko! I'm glad that we get to play some small part in bringing Sonic to you. A lot of people have come to us and told us about how Sonic is a massive part of who they are, just like you did. That's a really amazing thing and we're so glad you shared!
